post:
MyRoot.PW offers Bare Metal Unmanaged Servers in central Europe
(Vienna/Austria). Delivery in less than 24 Hours!

If you order before between 17th of September and 1st of October 2020,
you will get a 50 percent-discount on your FIRST MONTH of service! 

**Code/Voucher: 1stMonth50**


==================>>Current Inventory:

MR1:
C3558 (4c,4t)
32GB ECC RAM
1x 120 GB NVME
2x 4TB HDD (CMR)
5TB Traffic on 100Mbit/s Port (1x IPv4)
IPMI/HTML5 Console Avalible
=> 55 EURO per Month **(1st Month: 27.5 Euro)** -[ ORDER](https://myroot.pw/user/index.php/order/config/index/servers/?group_id=1&pricing_id=1 " ORDER")

MR2:
C2758 (8c,8t)

=> 70 EURO per Month **(1st Month: 35 Euro)** - [ORDER](https://myroot.pw/user/index.php/order/config/index/servers/?group_id=1&pricing_id=2 "ORDER")

General:
* IPv4 Addresses: +1x ipv4......+1.5 Euro/Month
